General.Name: Dream Office Real Estate Investment Trust
General.Description: Dream Office REIT is an unincorporated, open-ended real estate investment trust. Dream Office REIT is a premier office landlord in downtown Toronto with over 3.5 million square feet owned and managed. We have carefully curated an investment portfolio of high-quality assets in irreplaceable locations in one of the finest office markets in the world.
General.Address: State Street Financial Center, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 3H1
